answerText: Madame Anna Sergeneev Odintsof [prompt on "Anna"; accept Odintsova][10] Madame Odintsof appears in this work, in which Arkady is friends with the student Bazarov. It is by Ivan Turgenev.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Ike Jose + Tanay Kothari | 1 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Sitnikof introduces this character to the main character of the work in which she appears. For 10 points each: [10] Name this wealthy widow who hosts various intellectuals at her home. At the end of the novel she appears in, her sister Katya marries Arkady Kirsanov.
